channel.title: [Release] Dragon Bow [/Release] :D
channel.description:
Ok, I have decided to make a drop model and ints to go with this, the held model, drop model, and ints are all conveniently packed into one folder which has been put into a Winrar archive.
Now that, that useless explanation is over here is a picture of the Dragon Bow:
[IMG]http://i453.photobucket.com/albums/qq251/RuneModelMaker/dragonbow.jpg[/img]
Now here are the downloads: [URL=http://www.mediafire.com/?yymxwa0znye]Mediafire[/URL] [URL=http://uppit.com/AC7TDI]Uppit[/URL]
And for those of you lazy bums who don't feel like opening the ints file here are the ints: [CODE]if(i == 8002) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 804; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 2128;//Model Zoom class8.anInt190 = 591;//Model Rotation class8.anInt198 = 1034;//model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt204 = 138;//Unknown class8.anInt199 = -1;//noteable class8.anInt169 = 8;// model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 11;//model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 805;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 805;//female wearing class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable//Unknown class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Dragon Bow";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A bow crafted from dragon scales and dragon fire.".getBytes();//examin info }[/CODE]

Ok, I have decided to make a drop model and ints to go with this, the held model, drop model, and ints are all conveniently packed into one folder which has been put into a Winrar archive.

Now that, that useless explanation is over here is a picture of the Dragon Bow:

And for those of you lazy bums who don’t feel like opening the ints file here are the ints:

if(i == 8002) // change this if you need to "item number" { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield";//New option class8.anInt174 = 804; //Model ID class8.anInt181 = 2128;//Model Zoom class8.anInt190 = 591;//Model Rotation class8.anInt198 = 1034;//model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle class8.anInt204 = 138;//Unknown class8.anInt199 = -1;//noteable class8.anInt169 = 8;// model offset increase to move to the right class8.anInt194 = 11;//model offset increase to move up class8.anInt165 = 805;//male wearing class8.anInt200 = 805;//female wearing class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable//Unknown class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable class8.aString170 = "Dragon Bow";//Name of the new item class8.aByteArray178 = "A bow crafted from dragon scales and dragon fire.".getBytes();//examin info }
